import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import './cards.css' import imgDoight from '../../assets/img/doight.svg' import imgFleche from '../../assets/img/triangleHautBas.svg' import carrer from '../../assets/img/groupe.svg' import { useRef } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { motion, useScroll,useTransform } from "framer-motion" export default function Cards({color,setcolor}) { const englobeCardTitre =useRef({}); const titreCard = useRef(); const cardDeux = useRef(); const beakpointUn = useRef(); const beakpointQuatre = useRef(null); const {scrollYProgress} = useScroll({ target:beakpointQuatre, offset:["0 1","1 1"], }) const rotationCardUne = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0,1],[`translate3d(110px,55px,0px) rotateZ(-10deg)`,`translate3d(0px,0px,0px) rotateZ(0deg)`]); const rotationCardTrois = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0,1],[`translate3d(-110px,55px,0px) rotateZ(10deg)`,`translate3d(0px,0px,0px) rotateZ(0deg)`]); return (
